item.title: How to serialize integers into memory
item.description: Here is the analysis of a recent bug that happenned to me. My initial reaction was that the compiler had a bug (or that “These are wrong bees”). Consider the code below. We copy 64 integers into a properly allocated destination buffer and yet, if compiled with -O3 switch this code crahes with segfault!.

item.title: My first post
item.description: Hi it’s my first attemp at blogging. I’ve chosen Hugo with Icarus theme for the content generation. This blog is going to be published vi my github repository. Stay tuned!
